items.sentence: Tom didn't marry the woman that we all thought he was going to marry.
Tom didn't think that he'd make it out of the burning building alive.
I don't think that Tom knows what time Mary's train will be arriving.
If Tom would've identified himself, the guard wouldn't have shot him.
Tom put everything into a big box and then carried it out to his car.
I'll introduce you to a friend of mine who used to live in Australia.
We waited half an hour at the library for Tom, but he didn't show up.
It's completely irrelevant whether Tom was the one who did it or not.
I had forgotten all about today\'s meeting. I\'m glad you reminded me.
I came to Boston three years ago and have been living here ever since.
